title: FatherTimeSDKP Framework — SDKP Quantum Mechanics & Digital Crystal Protocol Integration
description: Unified SDKP–QCC0–Digital Crystal Protocol framework authored by Donald Paul Smith (FatherTimeSDKP / FatherTimes369v). This integrates Size–Density–Kinetics–Position (SDKP) mechanics, Tesla’s 3-6-9 logic (FatherTimes369v), Shape–Dimension & Number (SD&N), Loop Learning for Artificial Life (LLAL), and the Digital Crystal Protocol for cryptographic and structural validation.
